data.prayer: Father, let those from the 183,536 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Elgeyo-Marakwet, Kenya
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Elgeyo-Marakwet, Kenya.

data.section_summary: On average, 11 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Elgeyo-Marakwet, Kenya.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, help the people of Elgeyo-Marakwet, Kenya to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Elgeyo-Marakwet access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Hindi people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please give the church in the state of Elgeyo-Marakwet prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Elgeyo-Marakwet
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 183,536 believers in the state of Elgeyo-Marakwet.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

location.name: Elgeyo-Marakwet
